chapters.title: Section 1—The Outlook
chapters.content: “Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.”

chapters.title: Section 2—Evangelistic Work
chapters.content: “How beautiful upon the mountains are the feet of him that bringeth good tidings, that publisheth peace; ... that saith unto Zion, Thy God reigneth.”

chapters.title: Section 3—Education
chapters.content: “The Lord giveth wisdom: out of His mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.”

chapters.title: Section 4—Medical Missionary Work
chapters.content: “Everything ... whithersoever the rivers shall come, shall live.” “Their waters they issued out of the sanctuary.”

chapters.title: Section 6—Cautions and Counsels
chapters.content: “Thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it.”

chapters.title: Section 7—Calls to Service
chapters.content: “I heard the voice of the Lord, saying, Whom shall I send, and who will go for us? Then said I, Here am I; send me.”
